name: Nothing To Hide (itch)
description:
Welcome comrade !

You are now part of the resistance against the oppressive totalitarian government ! I an see a bright future in you !

In the meantime, we need your help to hide this item ! Police drone will show up but as you are not a known activist, they should simply perform a quick scan of your apartment !

Good luck comrade !

*experimental

ActionKeyMove
WASDLook Around
MousePick up item
Windowd : Left Click (hold)
Mac : Right Click (hold) (sorry)
Left ShiftRun (hold)
Rotate item in hand*
Q/E and R/F

*experimental feature

This game was made in 3 days for the Ludum Dare 47
